text: when it comes to the appian partners we
quickly moved from a standard partner to
an advanced consulting partner to a
premier partner and over the period of
time we have accomplished different
competencies along the way I don't think
in any industry you can go from zero to
where we are today in three years at
this pace my name is shaker pulley I'm
one of the founding managing partners of
rain cloud rain cloud is a full-service
cloud systems integrator we help
enterprises fast-track their cloud
adoption our headquarters is based in
London Northern Virginia we have offices
in Philadelphia LA as well as in India
and we have recently started our
operations in Israel as well the
business drivers for rain to work with
AWS are pretty obvious in the sense that
you see the the journey towards the
cloud and we want it to be part of that
the business benefits that rain cloud
has received from the APN partner
program has been irreplaceable and
invaluable in our growth trajectory we
were born in the cloud consulting firm
with former Amazon executives and we
found it essential to be part of the
appian network as well as provide a
platform to validate our expertise there
are many benefits to the program that we
have leveraged with the market
development fund program we were able to
reach out spread the message of AWS
cloud computing and our cloud computing
consulting expertise to new
opportunities that we've converted into
exciting multi-year projects we were
able to get our staff trained and
certified through some of the training
programs and certification programs that
the EPM program offers we have over 70
Amazon certified solution architects we
have people who have all of the Amazon
PI certifications which is very very
unique in the Amazon space enterprises
have unique challenges whether it be
their business transformation needs
their enterprise silos that they are
operating in their legacy systems so our
services include from business
consulting which is ROI business case
justification the cloud strategy all the
way up to implementation migration and
the managed services the way we
differentiate ourselves in the migration
strategy is our migration factory is run
by machines the lift and shift approach
will get our customers to the cloud but
they carry the burden and old style of
operations whereas if we take it DevOps
based approach they will be very agile
in their operations so they will get the
benefit of being responsive to their
customers and increase stability and
reliability and their operations when we
started reign it was three people
needless to say we have grown leaps and
bounds globally we have four locations
and from an employee point of view we
have moved from three employees to 130
plus employees what has been really
satisfying and fruitful for us is seeing
this industry transform and how we are
one of the leading change agents to help
customers make that journey and that is
what is very satisfying to us is being
there to be able to help the customers
